name: Whitnell Family Office

recent_activities.headline: Rockefeller Capital Management Acquires Whitnell & Co.
recent_activities.description: Rockefeller Capital Management has entered into an agreement to acquire Whitnell & Co., a $1.4 billion wealth management firm based in Chicago.
recent_activities.full_text: Rockefeller Capital Management has reached an agreement to acquire Oak Brook, Illinois-based Whitnell & Co., a $1.4 billion RIA.

key_transactions.description: Whitnell & Co. was acquired to enhance Rockefeller's wealth management footprint in the Midwest.

strategy_insights: The acquisition indicates a strategic push to acquire client bases and expand wealth management services in the Midwest.

name: Cresset Capital

recent_activities.headline: Cresset Secures $150M Minority Investment from Constellation Wealth Capital
recent_activities.description: Cresset announced a strategic investment aimed at enhancing its growth and expansion in wealth management services.
recent_activities.full_text: Cresset announced that it has closed on a $150 million minority, long-duration investment from Constellation Wealth Capital.

key_transactions.description: Investment to expand Cresset's services and growth in the ultra-high-net-worth space.

strategy_insights: Cresset appears to be actively focusing on expanding its wealth management offerings through notable investments.
